items.rationale: TILE is the acronym for assessing manual handling risks: Task, Individual, Load, Environment.

items.stem: Where should you keep the load when lifting?
items.rationale: Keeping the load close to your body reduces the strain on your back.

items.stem: What should you do if a load is too heavy?
options: Ask for help or use a trolley
items.rationale: Never attempt to lift something beyond your capability. Use mechanical aids or team lifting.
